full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** One (1) Project Leader/Executive, Level 3

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01008173

**Publication Date:** September 23, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** October 11, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

**Opportunity Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Category:** Service (SRV)

**Method of Supply:** Competitive – Open Bidding

**Expected Contract Duration:** Two (2) years, with three (3) additional option years

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services. The requirement is for one (1) Senior Project Leader/Executive to support Director Aerospace Equipment Business (DAEBM) 7 and its Sustainment Centre of Expertise Air (CoE Air) activities.

**Scope of Work:**

* Project Management Services
* Category: Project Leader/Executive, Level 3
* Estimated Level of Effort: 230 days per year

**Security Requirements:**

* Supplier Security Clearance required: FSC – Secret
* Security Level required (Document Safeguarding): None

**Region of Work:**

* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Specific Location: 455 Boulevard de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC

**Trade Agreements:**

* Compliant with the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Compliant with the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Compliant with other applicable free trade agreements

**Pre-Qualified Suppliers:**

This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for the following category: 3.3 Project Leader/Executive, Level 3.

**How to Access the RFP Documentation:**

The RFP documents will be e-mailed directly to the pre-qualified suppliers.

**Point of Contact:**

* Name: Sharon Sally
* Email: sharon.sally@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 819-939-8990

The Department of National Defence (DND) reserves the right to cancel or modify the RFP at any time. The RFP is subject to the rules and regulations of the Government of Canada.

For more information, please visit [Buy and Sell website](https://buyandsell
